casebody.data:
MICHIGAN HEAD & SPINE INSTITUTE, P.C., Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Beaumont Health and Kuanda Bey, Intervening Plaintiffs,
v.
GEICO INDEMNITY COMPANY and State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157289
COA: 340273 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 6, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for immediate consideration is GRANTED. The motion for reconsideration of this Court's May 29, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
